mapper.select: /*아티스트 라이브러리 신진 작가 조회*/ SELECT A.ARTST_SQ AS artstSq, A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM AS artstActvtyNm, /*작가 이름*/ A.ARTST_ENGLS_NM AS artstEnglsNm, /*작가 영어 이름*/ A.ARTST_PROFILE_IMG_URL AS artstProfileImgUrl, /*작가 프로필 사진*/ A.ARTST_SELF_INTRO AS artstSelfIntro, /*작가 소개*/ A.ARTST_WORK_IMG_URL AS artstWorkImgUrl, /*작가 작품 대표 사진*/ YEAR (B.MBR_BIRTH) AS artistBirthYear /*작가 생년*/ FROM TBL_DA_ARTST_M AS A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_MBR_M AS B ON A.MBR_SQ = B.MBR_SQ /*WHERE YEAR (B.MBR_BIRTH) BETWEEN '1980' AND YEAR (NOW())*/

/*아티스트 라이브러리 중견 작가 조회*/ SELECT A.ARTST_SQ AS artstSq, A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM AS artstActvtyNm, /*작가 이름*/ A.ARTST_ENGLS_NM AS artstEnglsNm, /*작가 영어 이름*/ A.ARTST_PROFILE_IMG_URL AS artstProfileImgUrl, /*작가 프로필 사진*/ A.ARTST_SELF_INTRO AS artstSelfIntro, /*작가 소개*/ A.ARTST_WORK_IMG_URL AS artstWorkImgUrl, /*작가 작품 대표 사진*/ YEAR (B.MBR_BIRTH) AS artistBirthYear /*작가 생년*/ FROM TBL_DA_ARTST_M AS A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_MBR_M AS B ON A.MBR_SQ = B.MBR_SQ /*WHERE YEAR (B.MBR_BIRTH) BETWEEN '1965' AND '1979'*/

/*아티스트 라이브러리 원로 작가 조회*/ SELECT A.ARTST_SQ AS artstSq, A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM AS artstActvtyNm, /*작가 이름*/ A.ARTST_ENGLS_NM AS artstEnglsNm, /*작가 영어 이름*/ A.ARTST_PROFILE_IMG_URL AS artstProfileImgUrl, /*작가 프로필 사진*/ A.ARTST_SELF_INTRO AS artstSelfIntro, /*작가 소개*/ A.ARTST_WORK_IMG_URL AS artstWorkImgUrl, /*작가 작품 대표 사진*/ YEAR (B.MBR_BIRTH) AS artistBirthYear /*작가 생년*/ FROM TBL_DA_ARTST_M AS A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_MBR_M AS B ON A.MBR_SQ = B.MBR_SQ /*WHERE YEAR (B.MBR_BIRTH) BETWEEN '1950' AND '1964'*/

SELECT A.ARTST_SQ AS artstSq, /*작가 순번*/ A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM AS artstActvtyNm, /*작가 활동명*/ A.ARTST_ENGLS_NM AS artstEnglsNm, /*작가 영문명*/ A.ARTST_SELF_INTRO AS artstSelfIntro, /*작가 자기소개*/ A.ARTST_FACEBOOK_URL AS artstfacebookUrl, /*작가 페이스북 주소*/ A.ARTST_INSTAGRAM_URL AS artstInstagramUrl, /*작가 인스타그램 주소*/ A.ARTST_HMPG_URL AS artstHmpgUrl, /*작가 홈페이지 주소*/ C.EDUCTN_NM AS eductnNm, /*작가 학력 명*/ C.EDUCTN_MAJOR AS eductnMajor, /*작가 학력 전공*/ C.EDUCTN_ENDNG_DATE AS eductnEndngDate, /*작가 학력 종료 일자*/ B.CAREER_NM AS careerNm, /*작가 경력 명*/ B.CAREER_ENDNG_DATE AS careerEndngDate, /*작가 경력 종료 일자*/ D.EXHBTN_NM AS exhbtnNm, /*작가 전시 명*/ D.EXHBTN_ENDNG_DATE AS exhbtnEndngDate, /*작가 전시 종료 일자*/ A.ARTST_PROMTN_VIDEO_URL AS artstPromtnVideoUrl /*작가 홍보 비디오 주소*/ FROM TBL_DA_ARTST_M AS A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_ARTST_CAREER_S AS B ON A.ARTST_SQ = B.ARTST_SQ INNER JOIN TBL_DA_ARTST_EDUCTN_S AS C ON A.ARTST_SQ = C.ARTST_SQ INNER JOIN TBL_DA_ARTST_EXHBTN_S AS D ON A.ARTST_SQ = D.ARTST_SQ WHERE A.ARTST_SQ = #{artstSq}
